compatibility.notes: SOFA license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Users must accept the terms and conditions to use the software.
Derived works must be marked and described appropriately.
No claims of authorship or patent applications on SOFA software.
license.name: SOFA
obligations: Mark derived works to indicate they are based on SOFA software.
Include descriptions of how the derived work differs from SOFA software.
Do not use the prefixes 'iau' or 'sofa' in routine names.
Do not misrepresent the origin of SOFA components.
Reproduce the requirements in any source distribution.
